title: Medical monitoring generic template for visualization
description: This report visualized input data with a function of the medical monitoring package.

templatePackage.doc: package from which the template should be extracted

dataFileName.doc: name of the data file of interest

plotFunction.doc: plotting function of the package to consider

comparisonTableType.doc: output type of the comparison table

comparisonTableParams.doc: parameters for the comparison table, passed to \link[glpgUtilityFct]{compareTables}

loopingVar.doc: data variable(s) to loop over, for which each output should be created

loopingNMax.doc: maximum number of elements of \code{loopingVar} to include in the report
